languages.text: "Вольный Торговец". {n}Дознаватель слегка кланяется.{/n} "Я был несколько резок при первой встрече и хотел бы загладить вину, выразив благодарность за вашу помощь в электродинамической обители. Ваше появление было как нельзя своевременным".

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец". {n}Дознаватель слегка кланяется.{/n} "Я был несколько резок при первой встрече и хотел бы загладить вину, выразив благодарность за вашу помощь в электродинамической обители. Ваше появление было как нельзя своевременным".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец". {n}Дознаватель слегка кланяется.{/n} "Я был несколько резок при первой встрече и хотел бы загладить вину, выразив благодарность за вашу помощь в электродинамической обители. Ваше появление было как нельзя своевременным".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人。”{n}审讯官朝你鞠了一躬。{/n}“我们第一次见面的时候，我的态度有些粗鲁，我希望能弥补一下。我想感谢你在神圣电驱修会时提供的帮助，你的到来恰逢其时。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人。”{n}审讯官朝你鞠了一躬。{/n}“我们第一次见面的时候，我的态度有些粗鲁，我希望能弥补一下。我想感谢你在神圣电驱力修会时提供的帮助，你的到来恰逢其时。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente». {n}El interrogador te ofrece una leve reverencia.{/n} «Fui un tanto brusco durante nuestro primer encuentro y me gustaría compensárselo, expresando mi agradecimiento por su ayuda en el cenobium electrodinámico. Su llegada no podía haberse producido en mejor momento».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente». {n}El interrogador te ofrece una leve reverencia.{/n} «Fui un tanto brusco durante nuestro primer encuentro y me gustaría compensárselo, expresando mi agradecimiento por su ayuda en el cenobium electrodinámico. Su llegada no podía haberse producido en mejor momento».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者」{n}インテロゲイターは軽く頭を下げる。 {/n}「初対面では無愛想な態度をとってしまったがその埋め合わせとして、エレクトロダイナミック・セノビアムでの協力に感謝の意を表したい。あなたの到着はまさにちょうどいいタイミングだった」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者」{n}インテロゲイターは軽く頭を下げる。 {/n}「初対面では無愛想な態度をとってしまったがその埋め合わせとして、エレクトロダイナミック・セノビアムでの協力に感謝の意を表したい。あなたの到着はまさにちょうどいいタイミングだった」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, {n}vous salue l'interrogateur en s'inclinant à peine.{/n} J'admets avoir été quelque peu brusque lors de notre première rencontre. Pour me faire pardonner, je voudrais vous exprimer mes remerciements pour votre aide dans le Cenobium électrodynamique. Vous êtes {mf|arrivé|arrivée} à point nommé, je dois dire. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, {n}vous salue l'interrogateur en s'inclinant à peine.{/n} J'admets avoir été quelque peu brusque lors de notre première rencontre. Pour me faire pardonner, je voudrais vous exprimer mes remerciements pour votre aide dans le Cenobium électrodynamique. Vous êtes {mf|arrivé|arrivée} à point nommé, je dois dire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Der Interrogator verneigt sich kurz.{/n} "Ich war bei unserem ersten Treffen ein wenig rüde und würde das gerne wieder gutmachen, indem ich Euch meinen Dank ausspreche für Eure Unterstützung im Elektrodynamischen Cenobium. Ihr hättet zu keinem besseren Zeitpunkt eintreffen können."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Der Interrogator verneigt sich kurz.{/n} "Ich war bei unserem ersten Treffen ein wenig rüde und würde das gerne wieder gutmachen, indem ich Euch meinen Dank ausspreche für Eure Unterstützung im Elektrodynamischen Cenobium. Ihr hättet zu keinem besseren Zeitpunkt eintreffen können."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."

languages.text: "Hür Tacir." {n}Sorgucu hafifçe eğiliyor.{/n} "İlk karşılaşmamızda bir miktar nezaketsiz davrandım ve Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'ndaki yardımlarından dolayı minnettarlığımı sunarak bunu telafi etmek isterim. Daha iyi bir zamanda ortaya çıkman mümkün değildi."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader." {n}The Interrogator offers a scant bow.{/n} "I was somewhat brusque at our first meeting and I would like to make up for it by expressing my thanks for your assistance in the Electrodynamic Cenobium. Your arrival could not have come at a better time."
